org.eclipse.keyple.seproxy.plugin

Class AbstractObservableReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.keyple.util.Observable<T>
      • org.eclipse.keyple.seproxy.plugin.AbstractObservableReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<ProxyReader>, ProxyReader, NameableConfigurable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractLocalReader

    public abstract class AbstractObservableReader
extends Observable<T>
implements ProxyReader
    Abstract definition of an observable reader. Factorizes setSetProtocols and will factorize the transmit method logging

      • notifyObservers

        public final void notifyObservers(T event)
        This method shall be called only from a SE Proxy plugin or reader implementing AbstractObservableReader or AbstractObservablePlugin. Push a ReaderEvent / PluginEvent of the selected AbstractObservableReader / AbstractObservablePlugin to its registered Observer.
        Overrides:
        notifyObservers in class Observable<T>
        Parameters:
        event - the event

      • setParameters

                         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                KeypleBaseException
        Set a list of parameters on a reader.

        See NameableConfigurable.setParameter(String, String) for more details

        Specified by:
        setParameters in interface NameableConfigurable
        Parameters:
        parameters - the new parameters
        Throws:
        KeypleBaseException - This method can fail when disabling the exclusive mode as it's executed instantly
